      • checkChoices

        public boolean checkChoices(String choices)
        This method is defined to validate choices of user
        Parameters:
        choices - Choices should be ROCK OR PAPER OR SCISSOR
        Returns:
        false if invalid choices else true

      • checkValidNames

        public boolean checkValidNames(String names)
        This method check the given input for name is correct or not
        Parameters:
        names - Check the name is not empty and not contain any number
        Returns:
        true if name is valid else false
